"So when the Samaritans were come unto Him, they besought Him that He would tarry with them: and He abode 
                                                                           31
there two days." And what busy days these were! What is the record of the result? "And many more believed because of His own word; and said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard Him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world." Verses 40-42.
